import React, { Component } from 'react' import DashBoardNavBar from '../DashBoardNav/DashBoardNavBar'; import profile from '../../assets/img/undraw_profile_pic_ic5t.svg' import './DashBoard.css' class DashBoard extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { data:{ firstname : 'Ayooluwa', profilepic: profile, daysremaining: 10, daysavailable: 21, } } } render(){ return(

Welcome {this.state.data.firstname}

Statistics

{this.state.data.daysremaining}

Days remaining out of {this.state.data.daysavailable} available days.

Used So Far
  • Holiday: 10
  • Sick Leave: 1 out of 10
Statistics
Statistics
) } } export default DashBoard;
